titleStmt.title: A letter vvritten to the right vvorshipfull the Gouernours and assistants of the East Indian marchants in London containing the estate of the East Indian fleete, with the names of the chiefe men of note dead in the voyage.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by R. Read] for Thomas Thorppe, and are to be sould by William Aspley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
